content.prompt: Directions: You will hear a brief conversation between two speakers. The exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Dans ce cas, vos prix ne sont pas abordables.
Mais je ne souhaite pas aller aussi loin.
Dans ce cas, je préfère passer à l’agence.
Impossible, je ne me le rappelle pas.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Affect the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
